body:
### Welcome Javascript Developers!
Slatebox.js is the javascript library behind [Slatebox.com's](http://slatebox.com) mind-mapping and concept drawing. This source even includes the [signalr](https://github.com/SignalR/SignalR) hooks to wire up real-time collaboration.

### 2 Minute Startup
To make it really easy to use, simply include a reference to the 71kb gzipped and minified Slatebox.js library (which includes the full [raphael](https://github.com/DmitryBaranovskiy/raphael/) and [signalr](https://github.com/SignalR/SignalR) libraries -- two Slatebox dependencies) as well as jquery (only required for SignalR collaboration).

```
<script src="http://ajax.aspnetcdn.com/ajax/jquery/jquery-1.8.0.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://static.slatebox.com/dev/js/0.5.0/slatebox.min.js"></script>
```

[Now, click here to view a live demo](https://s3.amazonaws.com/slatebox/examples/0.5.0/simple/sample.html).

### Authors and Contributors
Slatebox.js is authored by @TimHeckel.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble? The best place to ask for help is at [Stack Overflow](http://stackoverflow.com).
